alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goshen and southeastern Platte Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slater, or 20 miles southeast of Wheatland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Veteran and Slater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
